import React from 'react'; import './Header.css' import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useStateValue } from '../../Hooks/stateProvider'; import { auth } from '../../firebase'; function Header() { const [state, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const handleAuthentication = () => { if(state.user){ auth.signOut(); } } return (
{state.user ? state.user.email : "Hello Guest"} {state.user ? "Sign Out" : "Sign In"}
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{state.basket?.length}
) } export default Header;
